newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Death toll 44 Arabs, 11 Israelis at 2000 gmt.
newsitem.headline: Death toll 44 Arabs, 11 Israelis at 2000 gmt.

text.p: Israeli troops shot dead 39 Palestinians and Palestinian forces killed 11 Israeli soldiers in clashes on Thursday, the Palestinian health ministry and the Israeli army said.

The health ministry said 25 Palestinians were killed in the Gaza Strip and 14 in the West Bank. It said 739 were wounded. The army said 11 Israeli soldiers were killed and 55 soldiers and three Israeli civilians were wounded.
The death toll from two days of violence is 44 Palestinians and 11 Israelis. A total of 1,085 Palestinians and about 65 Israelis have been wounded in the two days, officials said.
